item.title: The Highest ROI Asset
item.description: As you might feel hard times are approaching, failure of Silicon Valley Bank is not the only sign of what’s happening in the world. Enormous true inflation with a lot of excluded spheres in calculations and constant lie on reported numbers. The main question is how to protect yourself from upcoming “tsunami”, as some enlightened people are saying. Stocks, crypto, commodities, real estate, different currencies - all of this might evaporate in matter of a blink.
